3b7d3657-dc84-458f-9a1c-3a809220a8a3: Cull the Bold additionally removes −target's {g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}difficulty tier{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g}, −(2 × target's difficulty tier) {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g}, and −(2 × target's difficulty tier) {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} from the target.
4183c02b-673e-4e52-bc67-ef9234111daa: Hot on the Trail now has an unlimited {g|Encyclopedia:Range}range{/g} and reduces the target's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} by −{uip|ArmourReduction|8f583f74dfec446faa1fd96d186147b0}% for 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}.
1c36608f-ffe7-4224-a49d-a40ee9850e40: Raid grants an ally an additional +(2 × {g|Encyclopedia:Prey}prey{/g}'s {g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}difficulty tier{/g})% {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} against prey.
b123449a-5de7-4073-abbf-bfcb457499c6: All {g|Encyclopedia:Prey}prey{/g} has its {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} reduced by −<u>({g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}AGI{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} − 3)</u>, but by no less than −2.
0a3a7b7d-ea2d-482d-af0c-abb7ca408437: At the start of the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerHunterGlossary}Bounty Hunter{/g}'s {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, they gain +2 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} for each ally who is adjacent to {g|Encyclopedia:Prey}prey{/g}.
8019e67a-13c6-4808-9309-5b1cb984ad26: Each enemy affected by Piercing Shot has their {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} reduced by −{unit_stat|WarhammerBallisticSkill|bonus}% until the end of combat. Stacks.
cac6a3a7-dd96-4cc1-951a-6beae83b38c6: Every third {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit{/g} scored by the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerHunterGlossary}Bounty Hunter{/g} restores +1 charge of Hunt Down the Prey.
7997545c-a8a1-4cf2-bd3c-95e8ea7e7341: Hunt Down the Prey — Critical Bonuses
95e96edd-184a-4eee-8b9c-8f7bfe4e8e5c: If Claim the Bounty kills an enemy, the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerHunterGlossary}Bounty Hunter{/g}'s next attack this {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} will always score a {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit{/g}.
9463685c-ca93-48d7-a1d6-2dfaabee6e6a: If the target's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} is equal to or less than 0 when the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerHunterGlossary}Bounty Hunter{/g} makes this attack, the target will suffer an additional +<u>(5 × {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}PER{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g})</u>% {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} from the Bounty Hunter's attacks until the end of the combat. Stacks.
08b8ae18-a996-4b30-9099-0d418d1c448e: Prior to the attack, all {g|Encyclopedia:Prey}prey{/g} suffers a −<u>(3 × {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}PER{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g})</u>% {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} until the end of combat.
bf88926b-7282-49d2-8a61-28619f5825d4: The number of times the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerHunterGlossary}Bounty Hunter{/g} can use Hunt Down the Prey.
ccb13d91-1a60-467b-b1a8-f16d619a089d: The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerHunterGlossary}Bounty Hunter{/g} designates an enemy in a 10-cell radius as {g|Encyclopedia:Trailed}trailed{/g} and finishes the {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. Trailed: All allies gain +7% {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit chance{/g} against a trailed enemy, +15% if the enemy's {g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}difficulty tier{/g} is more than or equal to V. If an ally kills a trailed enemy: - The Bounty Hunter gains an additional turn after that ally's turn, with all {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} remaining from the moment the Bounty Hunter used Hot on the Trail. - The Bounty Hunter gains an additional +(2 + target's difficulty tier / 2) MP. - The {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}cooldown{/g} of Hot on the Trail is reset. When Hot on the Trail is used for the third time during combat, the Bounty Hunter recovers +1 charge of Hunt Down the Prey.
00964da0-8523-4bed-8ec8-51c7a4b9babb: The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerHunterGlossary}Bounty Hunter{/g} gains +{uip|CritChanceBonus|6c71bfc05fa0455fa5550d0e33fd288b}% {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit chance{/g} against all {g|Encyclopedia:Prey}prey{/g} whose {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} is reduced by any effects from either Bounty Hunter or {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAdeptGlossary}Operative{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Career}archetype{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talents{/g}.
fd7f12e8-6ea6-4fb1-8038-f0ec3f20ce2a: The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerHunterGlossary}Bounty Hunter{/g} gains +{unit_stat|WarhammerAgility|bonus} {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} and restores +3 charges of Hunt Down the Prey.
818afb66-e8b0-45af-a7f9-e4dd64cb0ede: The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerHunterGlossary}Bounty Hunter{/g} makes a free single attack with the selected weapon. That attack always {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g}, does not end the Bounty Hunter's movement, but deals just {uip|DamagePercent|a78f3ecf5c024fac860fc2beaa63a8f9}% of usual {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}. After each third enemy killed by Claim the Bounty, the Bounty Hunter recovers +1 charge of Hunt Down the Prey. Prey: if Claim the Bounty kills a target marked as prey, the Bounty Hunter receives +2 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}.
114a7cb5-ad71-4109-98e0-2b6da1bc9abb: The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerHunterGlossary}Bounty Hunter{/g} may mark any enemy in combat as {g|Encyclopedia:Prey}prey{/g}. Whenever the Bounty Hunter kills a target marked as prey, they gain a stackable {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} until the end of combat. The bonus depends on the enemy {g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}difficulty tier{/g} (the roman numeral on the enemy's icon): -I-II : +25% of the Bounty Hunter's {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g} as {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g} -III-IV: +(5 × prey's difficulty tier)% {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical damage{/g} and +(2 × prey's difficulty tier)% critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit chance{/g} until the end of combat -V-VII: both of the above Hunt Down The Prey has 3 charges at the start of combat.
60fa308f-0081-4289-a5ee-707e31bc60f8: The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerHunterGlossary}Bounty Hunter{/g} sets a trap on a free cell in a 10-cell radius around them. Any enemy entering the 2-cell radius around that trap activates the trap: - Each enemy in a 2-cell radius around that trap suffers {uip|DirectDamage|9216a3659b1a4111a35d3eafe05f8921} {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}direct damage{/g} and must pass an {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −{uip|ResistancePenalty|9216a3659b1a4111a35d3eafe05f8921} {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} or become {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g} until the enemy's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. - The Bounty Hunter gains +{unit_stat|WarhammerAgility|bonus} {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} at the beginning of their next turn. {g|Encyclopedia:Prey}Prey{/g}: a target marked as prey is always immobilised until their next turn.
aac8ab03-06bc-4b48-9734-8cd6f2cd1566: The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerHunterGlossary}Bounty Hunter{/g} simultaneously makes several attacks. The number of the attacks is equal to the number of {g|Encyclopedia:Prey}prey{/g} in combat. These attacks are equally divided among all prey in the Bounty Hunter's {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}line of sight{/g}. The attacks always {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} and always score {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hits{/g}.
72a82561-cef0-422c-8e60-5cd615c0f58f:
The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerHunterGlossary}Bounty Hunter{/g} simultaneously makes several attacks. The number of the attacks is equal to the number of {g|Encyclopedia:Prey}prey{/g} in combat. These attacks are equally divided among all prey in the Bounty Hunter's {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}line of sight{/g}. The attacks always {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} and always score {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit{/g}.
Until the end of combat, the Bounty Hunter's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} are reduced by −20.
25fecb6b-9aa3-4740-be84-a179cd4d62e6: The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerHunterGlossary}Bounty Hunter{/g}'s allies gain +{uip|CritChanceBonus|a56864477e624f6fbfdd8c526a1f9779} {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit chance{/g} against enemies affected with one or more of the following effects: {g|Encyclopedia:Prey}prey{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Trailed}trailed{/g}, or {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g}.
3493a6e2-d00a-40b3-b4b3-aada580d9718:
The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerHunterGlossary}Bounty Hunter{/g}'s first {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit{/g} in a {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} grants their allies a stacking +<u>(target's {g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}difficulty tier{/g} + Bounty Hunter's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}PER{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} / 3)</u>% bonus to {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g} until the end of combat.
Once a character with this bonus {g|Encyclopedia:Reload}reloads{/g}, the bonus is removed.
f6e4bd31-c233-4f05-963d-b1f351af3997: The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerHunterGlossary}Bounty Hunter{/g}'s next attack during this {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} will have +100% {g|Encyclopedia:OverpenetrationFullGlossary}overpenetration{/g} and +{uip|AdditionalOverpenetration|0d8923eff3f94a5faf71bfe36ca19d70}% {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:Prey}Prey{/g}: the next attack that {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} a target marked as prey is always a {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit{/g}.
fd3013b1-3c76-42f4-973a-eaa3634bd69d: The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerHunterGlossary}Bounty Hunter{/g}'s next attack this {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} will have additional effects: -Deals an additional +{unit_stat|WarhammerBallisticSkill|bonus} {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}. -Enemy's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} will be reduced by −(3 × target's {g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}difficulty tier{/g})% against all the Bounty Hunter's attacks until the end of combat. -If the enemy's armour against this attack is below 20%, the enemy's {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} is also decreased by −(3 × target's difficulty tier)% against all the Bounty Hunter's attacks until the end of combat, and the Bounty Hunter's next attack this turn deals an additional +{uip|AdditionalDamage|f333222c78614e6fb8ca145dd8cafcf6} damage. {g|Encyclopedia:Prey}Prey{/g}: if the target of the attack is marked as prey, the armour and {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}dodge reduction{/g} granted by Cull the Bold also work for the attacks of the Bounty Hunter's allies.
e233312f-2dc9-4fb8-a6f0-628a2e28472a: The {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical damage{/g} and critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit chance{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g} accumulated by using Hunt Down the Prey.
5ec8c178-3aaa-4b44-aa01-65f87be257a3: Until the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerHunterGlossary}Bounty Hunter{/g}'s next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, whenever an ally attacks a target marked as {g|Encyclopedia:Prey}prey{/g}, this attack deals +{uip|AdditionalDamage|1394e5c9a6a347db841d961a87f375f4}% additional {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} and gains half of the Bounty Hunter's current {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit chance{/g} and critical damage granted by Hunt Down the Prey.
0823c751-726c-436f-9602-26054174eeca: When the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerHunterGlossary}Bounty Hunter{/g} performs a {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacksGlossary}single-shot{/g} attack on an {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g} target, this attack refunds its cost and does not count for the attack limit. Once per {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.
cf558a3e-503f-4ab1-906b-1c207dda0e96: Whenever an ally kills {g|Encyclopedia:Prey}prey{/g}, the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerHunterGlossary}Bounty Hunter{/g} gains half of the {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g} granted by Hunt Down the Prey.
17c09a6f-2c74-4780-93c9-ff7e5d256ef6: Whenever an enemy is killed by a {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit{/g} scored by the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerHunterGlossary}Bounty Hunter{/g} or their ally, the Bounty Hunter gains +<u>(2 × enemy's {g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}difficulty tier{/g})</u>% {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} for 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}.
92dbe6db-fba3-49bd-b816-e86103b5e66c: Whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerHunterGlossary}Bounty Hunter{/g} attacks exactly one target with Wild Hunt, this attack deals +300% {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}.
261f9783-94eb-49fd-8cac-e30eb18a866e:
Whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerHunterGlossary}Bounty Hunter{/g} is attacked in {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee range{/g} for the first time since the end of their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, they automatically {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} that attack and move 1 cell in the opposite direction from the enemy.
The Bounty Hunter does not provoke {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attack of opportunity{/g} with this movement.
8a3a0bd0-e063-4dc5-ac43-3474b95229e2: Whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerHunterGlossary}Bounty Hunter{/g} kills an enemy whose {g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}difficulty tier{/g} is IV or higher, the Bounty Hunter immediately {g|Encyclopedia:Reload}reloads{/g} their weapon and attacks the closest enemy in their {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}line of sight{/g}. This attack gains +50% {g|Encyclopedia:OverpenetrationFullGlossary}overpenetration{/g} but deals only {uip|DamagePercent|e0dcfc42ff494a7ead8cd3a788ff7516}% of the Bounty Hunter's usual {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}.
dbee2dd1-d983-4c68-8d49-29afc1118fc4: Whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerHunterGlossary}Bounty Hunter{/g} kills an enemy with a {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit{/g}, all allies in a 7-cell radius around the target gain +<u>target's {g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}difficulty tier{/g}</u>% critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit chance{/g} until the end of combat. Stacks.
e65b6b46-d41f-4e02-a506-0c51330d7cac: Whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerHunterGlossary}Bounty Hunter{/g} kills {g|Encyclopedia:Prey}prey{/g} whose {g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}difficulty tier{/g} is IV or higher, the Bounty Hunter additionally gains +2 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}.
61cf5314-2f55-4d0b-814b-b79fc8ab65b0: Whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerHunterGlossary}Bounty Hunter{/g} scores a {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit{/g} for the first time in a {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, they gain +<u>target's {g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}difficulty tier{/g}</u> {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}movement points{/g}.
bcc346ca-32ed-4dbc-9afe-4203e2ea35f6: Whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerHunterGlossary}Bounty Hunter{/g} scores a {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit{/g}, the target's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} is reduced by −<u>({unit_stat|WarhammerBallisticSkill|bonus} + target's {g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}difficulty tier{/g})</u>% until the end of combat. Stacks.
7066be3c-094c-4484-a95b-956210190861: Whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerHunterGlossary}Bounty Hunter{/g} scores a {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit{/g}, they gain +{unit_stat|WarhammerPerception|bonus}% {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g} until the end of combat. Stacks.
85f872d7-0ca4-493e-b0d7-3b8ca08dd265: Whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerHunterGlossary}Bounty Hunter{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} an enemy with an attack, they inflict the {g|Encyclopedia:Catch}catch{/g} effect on that enemy. Catch: at the start of the Bounty Hunter's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, this target suffers a stacking −(2 × (catch's {g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}difficulty tier{/g} + {unit_stat|WarhammerPerception|bonus}))% {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to their {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g}. Once the catch moves or suffers {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}, the catch effect and the penalties are removed.
51cb03aa-9f7a-4290-b757-01f4563899d9: Whenever {g|Encyclopedia:Prey}prey{/g} deals {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerHunterGlossary}Bounty Hunter{/g}'s ally, the Bounty Hunter gains +<u>prey's {g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}difficulty tier{/g}</u>% damage against that prey for 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}. Stacks.
762c065a-9f80-410b-9ef8-8a6a0b6d8699: Whenever {g|Encyclopedia:Prey}prey{/g} is killed, all enemies in a 10-cell radius around the prey have their {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} reduced by −<u>(5 × prey's {g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}difficulty tier{/g})</u> for 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}.
45f9632d-84b3-4419-aafa-af8a3667999d: Whenever {g|Encyclopedia:Prey}prey{/g} that is not being {g|Encyclopedia:Trailed}trailed{/g} is killed by an ally, the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerHunterGlossary}Bounty Hunter{/g} gains an {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turn{/g} with half of their {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}. The Bounty Hunter {g|Encyclopedia:CantAttackEffect}cannot attack{/g} during this extra {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.
046517f9-09c6-4170-9825-88814ecac714:
{g|Encyclopedia:CareerHunterGlossary}Bounty Hunters{/g} are methodical killers who leave trails of dead bodies in their wake. A Bounty Hunter chooses their next target before the previous one has even realised it's dead.
Core focus: {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit{/g}, defence reduction, killing {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}priority target{/g}, repositioning.
